elements.title: 32nd anniversary of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests
elements.contents: ... that on the 32nd anniversary of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, the traditional venue for memorials in Hong Kong lay empty (blockade pictured) for the first time in thirty-two years?

elements.title: Margarita Gritskova
elements.contents: ... that mezzo-soprano Margarita Gritskova was José Carreras's partner for his farewell concert in Carnegie Hall?

elements.title: Slovenian Waters Act referendum
elements.contents: ... that the union of taxi drivers offered the residents of retirement homes free transport to the voting stations in the Slovenian Waters Act referendum?

elements.title: Robert Goodsir
elements.contents: ... that Robert Goodsir, searching for his brother Harry, lost with the Franklin expedition in the Arctic, found the graves of three expedition members?

elements.title: Battlefield Vegas
elements.contents: ... that Battlefield Vegas employees during the 2017 Las Vegas shooting drove several armored personnel carriers to Mandalay Bay to shield police officers at the request of a LVMPD sergeant?

elements.title: Askimam
elements.contents: ... that the Islamic website Askimam has been called more comprehensive, influential and wide-ranging than the web resources of al-Azhar and its sympathisers put together?

elements.title: Bronwyn Law-Viljoen
elements.contents: ... that professor Bronwyn Law-Viljoen became editor-in-chief of a publishing company, co-founded her own independent publishing company, and founded her own bookstore in South Africa?

elements.title: Frozen II
elements.contents: ... that astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson called out Disney for an inaccurate Frozen II poster?
